projects.title: Analog ASIC Design Flow
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and simulated a **current mirror** circuit using **xschem** for bias current replication.
 - Implemented the corresponding **layout** in **Magic VLSI**, ensuring accurate device matching and parasitic minimization.
 - Verified proper connectivity between schematic and layout through **LVS** and **DRC** checks to confirm design integrity.

projects.title: BYU Supermileage Car
projects.bodyText:
- Served as **Team Principal** and lead electronics engineer for the BYU Supermileage Team.
 - Designed custom electronics and system architecture for an ultra-efficient vehicle.
 - Achieved **1,918 miles per gallon** and won **1st place** in the Shell Eco-Marathon Internal Combustion Engine category, competing against teams across **North and South America**.

projects.title: RISC-V Processor Project
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented a **RISC-V processor** as part of a computer architecture course.
 - Explored instruction set architecture, pipelining, and performance trade-offs.
 - Strengthened expertise in digital design and hardware description languages.

projects.title: Course Development BYU
projects.bodyText:
- Led course development projects as an **Analog Circuit Designer** at BYU.
 - Designed and implemented new lab projects impacting three courses.
 - Reduced costs by more than **$40,000**, cutting the Junior Project Lab expense from **$400 to $30**, making education more accessible.

projects.title: Wireless Escape Room System
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a **wireless communication system** for an escape room company.
 - Designed protocols for reliable multi-device communication under real-time constraints.
 - Improved scalability and enhanced user experience in a commercial entertainment setting.

projects.title: Family Map Android Mobile App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an **Android mobile app** in Java as part of a software engineering course.
 - Implemented a family history mapping system with an interactive UI and backend integration.

projects.title: LLM Grading Tool
projects.bodyText:
- Designed an **automated grading tool** using large language models (LLMs).
 - Assisted in evaluating student submissions for consistency and correctness.
 - Improved instructor efficiency while ensuring fairness in assessment.

projects.title: Smart Doorbell Project
projects.bodyText:
- Built a **smart doorbell system** with integrated sensors and microcontrollers.
 - Implemented low-power operation and wireless notifications.
 - Designed hardware and software for reliability in real-world conditions.

projects.title: Self-Driving Car Project
projects.bodyText:
- Contributed to an experimental **self-driving car platform**.
 - Worked on control systems, sensor integration, and navigation algorithms.
 - Gained experience in autonomous systems and real-time decision making.
